George sighed. "Look. As I remember it, Luxanna Crownguard, or Lux, as she according to the lore prefers to be called was effectively the princess of Demacia, born in the town of High Silvermere. She's also occasionally called 'The Lady of Lumonsity', 'Radiant Lux' or 'Lady Crownguard'. She wears a skintight suit, a skirt, a breastplate with shoulder-pads..."

He was interrupted by George. "That's you, though. You're wearing that right now!"

"No I'm not? Lux also had a staff..." George said, but then looked down. He--now she was indeed wearing a skin-tight suit, blue in colour with a silver-coloured metal breastplate with golden edges and two rubies on the top edges of the plate. Her shoulder-plates were also made of the same metal outlined with the classic Demacian gold, with a frilly piece of cloth at the end.

Her skirt was white in colour, with a golden colour, sort of resembling a loincloth. with some armor also covering the bottom part of her, leaving her stomach essentially exposed to any attacks--had this been in a time-appropriate period, that is.
